channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 25, 2026 Today's Verse 2 Timothy 2:22 [22] So flee youthful passions and pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace, along with those who call on the Lord from a pure heart. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
